Summary: It came out of nowhere silently floated directly crossing above us above me and witnesses with a strange glow then simply vanished back in the sky.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Plattsburgh
There were no other sightings in Plattsburgh on or around May 22nd 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsWas having a fire, watching the stars i know much about helicopters, planes, jets, and everyrthing in the sky that it could have been. everyone was freaked out when i noticed it. i actually stood up to look at it better. it's as if it just appeared floated silently directly over all of us about 15-20 thousand feet then disapeared back into nothing and there were no clouds!!! very strange thanks for the help I felt AS though it was checking the fire, but after the incident i mysteriously lost my job, girlfriend, and where i lived and have begun a completely new life in just a few days, maybe is coincidence, but very strange I have also seen a triangle years back but this one was very styrange even to somone who doesn't believe in ufo's. I never had time to catch it on my phone i was stunned by the time i grabbed it it had vanished like it "shot away back to the sky"
Object Shape: Circle, Disc, Egg, Fireball, Sphere, Star-like, Teardrop, Unknown
